dragger.text: Drag files here or click button below to select files
dragger.hint: Supports single or batch upload of PDF/JPG/PNG files
dragger.hint_local: Supports PDF and image files. Sign in to enjoy free conversion and support for more file types
dragger.hint_logged_in_non_cloud: Currently only PDF or image files are supported. Select a Markdown.Fit cloud model to enable Office files
dragger.hint_cloud_logged_in: Supports PDF, image, and Office files (Word/Excel/PPT)
dragger.login_hint: Sign in to enjoy free conversion and support for more file types

form.model_empty: No models available, please configure models in Settings

messages.invalid_file_type: File {{filename}} is not a supported file type
messages.office_not_supported: File {{filename}} is an Office file. Please select cloud model and sign in to proceed

cloud.sign_in_required: Please sign in to use cloud conversion
